titles.title: Marcellus Shale On-the-Job Training Act of 2011
To amend the Workforce Investment Act of 1998, to authorize a national grant program for on-the-job training.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/6/2011--Introduced. Marcellus Shale On-the-Job Training Act of 2011 - Amends the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to require the Secretary of Labor to make discretionary grants to local areas for adult on-the-job training or dislocated worker on-the-job training at worksites directly related to the exploration for, production of, and transportation of natural gas from the Marcellus Shale formation.
